docs.title: My notes on Nvidia Cumulus technical stuff
My notes on Nvidia Cumulus technical stuff
docs.text: Please see left panel for different topics

docs.title: Config
docs.text:
cumulus@SN3420M-02:mgmt:~$ nv config diff --rev=applied --rev=startup
- unset:
    header:


cumulus@SN3420M-02:mgmt:~$ nv config diff --rev=13 --rev=12 -o commands
nv set mlag mac-address 44:38:39:ff:00:02



cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ nv config diff -o commands
nv set interface bond1 bond member swp49
nv set interface bond1 type bond



cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ nv config history
Rev ID   Apply Date           Type     User     Message
-------  -------------------  -------  -------  -------------------------------
9        2025-04-28 22:30:59  CLI      cumulus  Config update by cumulus
8        2025-04-28 22:30:28  CLI      cumulus  Config update by cumulus
7        2025-04-28 22:29:20  CLI      cumulus  Config update by cumulus
6        2025-04-28 18:52:10  CLI      cumulus  Config update by cumulus
5        2025-04-28 18:50:27  CLI      cumulus  Config update by cumulus
4        2025-04-28 18:47:37  CLI      root     Password sync for user: cumulus
startup  2025-04-28 17:33:41  Unknown  root     Config update by root
3        2024-12-01 01:44:11  CLI      root     Config update by root
2        2024-12-01 01:43:59  CLI      cumulus  Config update by cumulus
1        2024-12-01 01:43:31  CLI      root     Password sync for user: cumulus
startup  2024-12-01 01:42:33  Unknown  root     Config update by root

cumulus@SN3420M-02:mgmt:~$ nv config revi
Rev ID   State              Apply ID             Apply Date           Type  User     Reason         Message              
-------  -----------------  -------------------  -------------------  ----  -------  -------------  -------------------------------
1        applied_and_saved  rev_1_apply_1        2024-12-02 21:17:39  CLI   root     Config update  Password sync for user: cumulus
2        applied_and_saved  rev_2_apply_1        2024-12-02 21:18:08  CLI   cumulus  Config update  Config update by cumulus



cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ nv show system config
             operational  applied    pending
-----------  -----------  ---------  ---------
             apply        apply      apply
             auto-save    auto-save  auto-save
             snippet      snippet    snippet
apply
  overwrite  all          all        all
auto-save
  state      enabled      enabled    disabled

docs.title: Interface bond
docs.text:
cumulus@SN3420M-02:mgmt:~$ nv show int bonds <--5.11.0 new command
Interface  Admin Status  Oper Status  Mode  Mlag ID  Lacp-rate  Lacp-bypass  Up-delay  Down-delay
---------  ------------  -----------  ----  -------  ---------  -----------  --------  ----------
bond1      up            up           lacp  1        fast       off          0         0
bond2      up            down         lacp  2        fast       off          0         0
peerlink   up            up           lacp           fast       off          0         0
cumulus@SN3420M-02:mgmt:~$ nv show int bond-member
Error: Ambiguous Command:
  show interface
  show interface bond-members
cumulus@SN3420M-02:mgmt:~$ nv show int bond-members <--5.11.0 new command
Interface  Parent    Admin Status  Oper Status  Speed  MTU
---------  --------  ------------  -----------  -----  ----
swp1       bond1     up            up           10G    9216
swp2       bond2     up            up           10G    9216
swp49      peerlink  up            up           40G    9216



cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ nv show int bond1 bond member
      bonding-state  mii-status
----  -------------  ----------
swp1  active         up

cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ nv show int bond1 bond mlag
                operational  applied  pending
--------------  -----------  -------  -------
enable                       on       on
id              1            1        1
peer-interface  bond1
status          dual


cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ cat /proc/net/bonding/bond1
Ethernet Channel Bonding Driver: v6.1.0-cl-1-amd64

Bonding Mode: IEEE 802.3ad Dynamic link aggregation
Transmit Hash Policy: layer3+4 (1)
MII Status: up
MII Polling Interval (ms): 100
Up Delay (ms): 0
Down Delay (ms): 0
Peer Notification Delay (ms): 0

802.3ad info
LACP active: on
LACP rate: fast
Min links: 1
Aggregator selection policy (ad_select): stable

Slave Interface: swp1
MII Status: up
Speed: 10000 Mbps
Duplex: full
Link Failure Count: 0
Permanent HW addr: b0:cf:0e:4a:af:68
Slave queue ID: 0
Aggregator ID: 1
Actor Churn State: none
Partner Churn State: none
Actor Churned Count: 1
Partner Churned Count: 1

docs.title: Interface mgmt
docs.text:
cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ ping -I mgmt 10.16.40.1
vrf-wrapper.sh: switching to vrf "default"; use '--no-vrf-switch' to disable
/usr/share/mgmt-vrf/bin/ping: Warning: source address might be selected on device other than: mgmt
PING 10.16.40.1 (10.16.40.1) from 10.16.40.29 mgmt: 56(84) bytes of data.
64 bytes from 10.16.40.1: icmp_seq=1 ttl=255 time=0.729 ms
64 bytes from 10.16.40.1: icmp_seq=2 ttl=255 time=0.726 ms
^C

cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ ip route show vrf mgmt
default via 10.16.40.1 dev eth0 proto kernel
unreachable default metric 4278198272
10.16.40.0/22 dev eth0 proto kernel scope link src 10.16.40.29
127.0.0.0/8 dev mgmt proto kernel scope link src 127.0.0.1


cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ ip vrf exec mgmt ping 10.16.40.1
vrf-wrapper.sh: switching to vrf "default"; use '--no-vrf-switch' to disable
/usr/share/mgmt-vrf/bin/ping: connect: Network is unreachable

docs.title: Interface
docs.text:
# Command available after 5.11
$ nv show platform transceiver brief 
Transceiver  Identifier  Vendor name      Vendor PN         Vendor SN     Vendor revision
-----------  ----------  ---------------  ----------------  ------------  ---------------
swp1         SFP         FINISAR CORP.    FTLX8571D3BCL-HP  MU50PR6       A        
swp2         SFP         FOXCONN          CUFCP32-CHB01-EF  CN02KBG0N0    A        
swp49        QSFP+       Arista Networks  CAB-Q-Q-3M        ADY17120009K  20   

# Command available after 5.11
$ nv show platform transceiver swp1
cable-type                  : Optical module
supported-cable-length      : 30m om1, 80m om2, 300m om3, 0m om4, 0m om5
supported-cable-length-smf  : 0m
diagnostics-status          : Diagnostic Data Available
status                      : plugged_enabled
error-status                : N/A
vendor-date-code            : 15080732
identifier                  : SFP
vendor-rev                  : A
vendor-name                 : FINISAR CORP.
vendor-pn                   : FTLX8571D3BCL-HP
vendor-sn                   : MU50PR6
vendor-oui                  : 00:90:65
temperature:
  temperature               : 29.18 C
  high-alarm-threshold      : 78.00 C
  low-alarm-threshold       : -13.00 C
  high-warning-threshold    : 73.00 C
  low-warning-threshold     : -8.00 C

# Command available before 5.11
cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ nv show interface swp1 pluggable

-----------  ----------------
identifier   SFP
vendor-name  FINISAR CORP.
vendor-pn    FTLX8571D3BCL-HP
vendor-sn    MU50PR6
vendor-rev   A

        BR, Nominal                               : 10300MBd
        Rate identifier                           : 0x00 (unspec

Port:  swp1

docs.title: Mlag
docs.text:
nv set interface bond1 bond member swp1
nv set interface bond1 bond mlag id 1
nv set interface bond1-2 bond mlag enable on
nv set interface bond1-2 type bond
nv set interface bond1-2 bridge domain br_default
nv set interface bond2 bond member swp2
nv set interface bond2 bond mlag id 2
nv set interface peerlink bond member swp49
nv set interface peerlink type peerlink
nv set interface peerlink.4094 base-interface peerlink
nv set interface peerlink.4094 type sub
nv set interface peerlink.4094 vlan 4094
nv set mlag backup 10.16.40.29 vrf mgmtm
nv set mlag enable on
nv set mlag mac-address 44:38:39:ff:00:01


cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ nv show mlag
                operational               applied
--------------  ------------------------  -----------------
enable          on                        on
mac-address     44:38:39:ff:00:01         44:38:39:ff:00:01
peer-ip         fe80::b2cf:eff:fe4a:f310  linklocal
priority        32768                     32768
init-delay      180                       180
debug           off                       off
\[backup]        10.16.40.30               10.16.40.30
peer-priority   32768
**backup-active   True**
backup-vrf      mgmt
local-id        b0:cf:0e:4a:af:10
peer-id         b0:cf:0e:4a:f3:10
**local-role      primary**
**peer-role       secondary**
peer-interface  peerlink.4094
**peer-alive      True**
backup-reason

cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ clagctl
The peer is alive
     Our Priority, ID, and Role: 32768 b0:cf:0e:4a:af:10 primary
    Peer Priority, ID, and Role: 32768 b0:cf:0e:4a:f3:10 secondary
          Peer Interface and IP: peerlink.4094 fe80::b2cf:eff:fe4a:f310 (linklocal)
                      Backup IP: 10.16.40.30 vrf mgmt (active)
                     System MAC: 44:38:39:ff:00:01

CLAG Interfaces
Our Interface      Peer Interface     CLAG Id   Conflicts              Proto-Down Reason
----------------   ----------------   -------   --------------------   -----------------
           bond1   bond1              1         -                      -
           bond2   -                  2         lacp partner mac       -
                                                mismatch

cumulus@SN3420M-02:mgmt:~$ clagctl showtimers
Timers             Value     Time remaining
----------------   -------   --------------
initDelay          180       00:00:00
peerTimeout        20        00:00:20
reloadTimer        300       00:00:00
sendTimeout        30        -

docs.title: MLAG LOG
docs.text:
cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ sudo tail /var/log/clagd.log
[sudo] password for cumulus:
2025-04-30T09:54:46.170170+00:00 SN3420M-01 clagd[1763813]: Initial data sync to peer done.
2025-04-30T09:56:11.861018+00:00 SN3420M-01 clagd[1763813]: STP param resync done to peer
2025-04-30T09:56:11.861409+00:00 SN3420M-01 clagd[1763813]: neigh resync to peer done.
2025-04-30T09:56:11.861631+00:00 SN3420M-01 clagd[1763813]: Resync Sent To Peer

2025-04-30T09:57:41.913564+00:00 SN3420M-01 clagd[1763813]: neigh resync to peer done.
2025-04-30T09:57:41.913708+00:00 SN3420M-01 clagd[1763813]: Resync Sent To Peer
2025-04-30T09:57:43.068923+00:00 SN3420M-01 clagd[1763813]: HealthCheck: peerInitState changed
2025-04-30T09:57:49.521260+00:00 SN3420M-01 clagd[1763813]: bond1 is now dual connected.
2025-04-30T09:57:49.527473+00:00 SN3420M-01 clagd[1763813]: Conflict cleared (bond1): LACP partner MAC is no longer mismatched

docs.title: Routing
docs.text:
cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ nv show vrf mgmt router rib ipv4 route
Route          Protocol   Distance  Uptime                NHGId  Metric  Flags
-------------  ---------  --------  --------------------  -----  ------  ------------
0.0.0.0/0      kernel     255       2025-04-28T17:35:22Z  3      8192    fib-selected
                                                                         installed
                                                                         selected
10.16.40.0/24  connected  0         2025-04-28T22:30:59Z  35     0       fib-selected
                                                                         installed
                                                                         offloaded
                                                                         selected


cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ sudo ip rule add iif eth0 lookup mgmt


cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ ip rule show
98:     from all iif eth0 lookup mgmt
99:     from all to 10.16.43.247 iif lo ipproto udp dport 53 lookup mgmt
99:     from all to 10.16.43.246 iif lo ipproto udp dport 53 lookup mgmt
1000:   from all lookup [l3mdev-table]
32765:  from all lookup local
32766:  from all lookup main
32767:  from all lookup default

docs.title: DNS
docs.text:
$ nv set service dns mgmt server 10.16.43.247



cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ cat /etc/resolv.conf
domain hst.enablement.local
search hst.enablement.local
nameserver 10.16.43.247 # vrf mgmt
nameserver 10.16.43.246 # vrf mgmt

docs.title: NTP
docs.text:
$ nv unset service ntp mgmt
$ nv set service ntp mgmt server pool.ntp.org
$ nv set system timezone US/Central

cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ nv show service ntp
      listen  Summary
----  ------  ---------------------
mgmt  eth0    server: 23.168.24.210

cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ nv show service ntp mgmt

          operational     applied
--------  --------------  ------------
[server]  *23.168.24.210
[server]                  pool.ntp.org
listen    eth0            eth0

docs.title: SMTP
docs.text:
$ nv set system snmp-server listening-address 10.16.40.29 vrf mgmt
$ nv set system snmp-server readonly-community '$nvsec$929ec7be9e52e78079cbbcd042fb7497' access any
$ nv set system snmp-server state enabled



cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ nv show system snmp-server
                      applied
--------------------  ---------------------------------------
trap-link-up
  check-frequency     60
trap-link-down
  check-frequency     60
[listening-address]   10.16.40.29
[readonly-community]  $nvsec$929ec7be9e52e78079cbbcd042fb7497
state                 enabled

docs.title: System
docs.text:
nv set system hostanme 3420-01

sudo hostnamectl set-hostname 3420-01

cat /etc/hostname

docs.title: Troubleshooting
docs.text:
cumulus@SN3420M-01:mgmt:~$ nv show system wjh packet-buffer | head
#   dMAC               dPort  Dst IP:Port                      EthType  Drop group  IP Proto  Drop reason - Recommended action                                                                                                                                                      Severity  sMAC               sPort  Src IP:Port            Timestamp              VLAN
--  -----------------  -----  -------------------------------  -------  ----------  --------  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  --------  -----------------  -----  ---------------------  ---------------------  ----
1   01:00:5e:00:00:02  N/A    224.0.0.2:1985                   Dot1Q    L2          udp       Ingress VLAN filtering - Validate the VLAN membership configuration on both ends of the link                                                                                          Error     00:2a:6a:13:f2:81  swp2   10.16.100.254:1985     25/04/30 10:31:38.897  100
2   33:33:00:01:00:02  N/A    [ff02::1:2]:547 (dhcpv6-server)  Dot1Q    L2          udp       Ingress VLAN filtering - Validate the VLAN membership :bf10]:546 (dhcpv6-client)                                                              configuration on both ends of the link  Error     80:e0:1d:4a:bf:10  swp2   [fe80::82e0:1dff:fe4a  25/04/30 10:31:39.307  40
3   ff:ff:ff:ff:ff:ff  N/A    N/A                              Dot1Q    L2          N/A       Ingress VLAN filtering - Validate the VLAN membership configuration on both ends of the link                                                                                          Error     00:0c:29:f3:7a:19  swp2   N/A                    25/04/30 10:31:39.472  40

docs.title: Upgrade
docs.text:
Note

The supported upgrade path is the base image plus two. For example, if the starting image is Cumulus Linux 5.2, the latest release that package upgrade supports is Cumulus Linux 5.4 (5.2 + 2 = 5.4). Nvidia Upgrading Cumulus Linux

cumulus@SN3420M-02:mgmt:~$ cd /etc/apt
cumulus@SN3420M-02:mgmt:/etc/apt$ ls
apt.conf.d  auth.conf.d  keyrings  preferences.d  **sources.list**  sources.list.d  sources.list.dpkg-dist  trusted.gpg  trusted.gpg~  trusted.gpg.d
cumulus@SN3420M-02:mgmt:/etc/apt$


cumulus@switch:~$ sudo -E apt-get update

cumulus@switch:~$ sudo -E apt-get upgrade --dry-run

cumulus@switch:~$ sudo -E apt-get upgrade

                  161

                  161

                  161
br_default        1 PVID Egress Untagged

                  161
